message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for us to do business together. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counteroffer at $8500.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! However, I'm not quite comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm countering with a price of $9500.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me counter with $9000.
